name: mikroe.click.adswio2
short_description: AD-SWIO 2 Click is a quad-channel software configurable input/output solution based on AD74413R, for building and process control application. The AD74413R is a quad-channel software configurable input/output solution for building and process control applications. The device provides a fully integrated single chip solution for input and output operation. The AD-SWIO 2 Click contains four 13-bit DACs, one per chanal, and 16-bit Σ-∆ ADC.
